content:
I'd be happy to help you track your movie watching habits from previous months as well!

I can help you create a movie log that spans multiple months, so you can keep track of all the movies you've watched over time. Let's not limit ourselves to just June; we can go back in time and add movies from May (or any other month) that you remember watching.

To get started, I'll create a separate section for each month. We can add movies to each section as you remember them. Here's the updated format:

**Movie Log**

**June**

1. **The Matrix** (June 4th)
2. **Inception** (June 4th)
3. **Everything Everywhere All at Once** (June 4th)

**May**

[Add movies from May here]

**[Other months]**

[We can add more sections for other months as needed]

Now, take your time to think back to May. What movies do you remember watching that month? You can add titles, and I'll help you organize them.
